alert.note: Alert for East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Far Northeast Highlands; Northeast Highlands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 3:26PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTH CENTRAL SAN MIGUEL AND SOUTH CENTRAL MORA COUNTIES THROUGH 400 PM MDT... At 326 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sapello, or 12 miles southeast of Mora, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Watrous, Sapello, Golondrinas and Manuelitas. This includes the following highways... Interstate 25 between Mile Markers 351 and 369. State Road 94 between Mile Markers 1 and 5. State Road 266 between Mile Markers 0 and 1. State Road 518 between Mile Markers 7 and 19. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Far Northeast Highlands; Northeast Highlands
